=== Introduction ===

QuickHex is a program written by JXQ to quickly splice two movie files together.

Supported formats: 
 * FCM ([http://code.google.com/p/fceu/ FCEU])
 * GMV ([http://code.google.com/p/gens-rerecording/downloads/list GENS])
 * M64 (Mupenv8)
 * MMV (Dega)
 * SMV ([http://code.google.com/p/snes9x-rr/ SNES9x]
 * VBM ([http://code.google.com/p/vba-rerecording/ VBA])

=== Code/Compiling ===

  * Language: Visual Basic
  * VB6 Project File
  * Author: JXQ
